import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import "./Home.css"; export default function Home() { const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleSearchSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault(); const formData = new FormData(event.currentTarget); const query = (formData.get("query") || "").toString().trim(); const field = (formData.get("field") || "family").toString(); const sort = (formData.get("sort") || "none").toString(); const params = new URLSearchParams(); if (query) { params.set("search", query); } if (field) { params.set("field", field); } if (sort && sort !== "none") { params.set("sort", sort); } const searchString = params.toString(); if (searchString) { navigate(`/plants?${searchString}`); } else { navigate("/plants"); } } return (
{/* floating accents */}
